knimeNode.name: Opera Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads result files from the Opera

intro.p: This node reads one or multiple result files (.res) of the Opera (PerkinElmer). This is done by searching for '.res'-files recursively within the specified directory or by selecting a list of files directly.

fullDescription.option: Select either several files within a directory or a single directory that contains Opera files (subfolders will be used as well).
